title: New: Foals – My Number
content: With the cryptic Foals website generating a fair amount of hype at the beginning of November, the release of Inhaler, the first single to be taken from their next album, was somewhat subdued in comparison. However newest track My Number is likely to add to anticipation building over the release of Holy Fire, their third album, which is out later next year. A return to the jagged, colourful guitars of Antidotes and off-beat percussion, it’s fairly standard Foals, but hey, if it’s not broken, why try to fix it? Check out My Number below, thanks to Disco Naiveté for the heads up.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
